update ku_old_car set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carid = #{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brandname = #{brandname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cartype = #{cartype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, distance = #{distance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, guapai = #{guapai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nianjian = #{nianjian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qiangxian = #{qiangxian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine = #{engine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, horsepower = #{horsepower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carload = #{carload,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, carlong = #{carlong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discharge = #{discharge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carprice = #{carprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, listorder = #{listorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, carimg1 = #{carimg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg2 = #{carimg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg3 = #{carimg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg4 = #{carimg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg5 = #{carimg5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg6 = #{carimg6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg7 = #{carimg7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carimg8 = #{carimg8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hits = #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select itemid, userid, username, mobile, carid,distance, guapai, areaid as cityid, amount as alxe, nianjian, qiangxian, engine, horsepower, carload, carlong, discharge, carprice, listorder, carimg1, carimg2, carimg3, carimg4, carimg5, carimg6, carimg7, carimg8, content,areaid, hits, addtime, state,message,brandname,cartype ,(select title from ku_site_category where itemid=brandname) as brandName ,(select title from ku_site_category where itemid=cartype) as carTypeName ,(select title from ku_site_category where itemid=engine) as engineName ,(select title from ku_site_category where itemid=alxe) as amountName ,(select areaname from ku_city where areaid=cityid) as areaName from ku_old_car where itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select itemid,carid,distance, guapai, carload, carlong, carprice, carimg1,areaid as cityid, state,message ,(select title from ku_site_category where itemid=brandname) as brandName ,(select title from ku_site_category where itemid=cartype) as carTypeName ,(select areaname from ku_city where areaid=cityid) as areaName from ku_old_car where userid = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
